title: Fist II - The Legend Continues  for Commodore 64 & 128
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Fist II - The Legend Continues [computer game]. Fist II is a single player side scrolling beat ‘em up with adventure elements. Players travel through different environments, fighting various enemies, collecting items and visiting temples to power up the character to be strong enough to defeat the warlord and free the land.
